name: Vaibhav Kumbhar
title: Software Engineer
tagline: Versatile and driven software developer with a passion for solving business challenges through innovative programming solutions.

achievements: Working on Securly Filter as a Golang developer.
Contributed to multiple components including request broker, web filtering, Chrome extensions, and reporting of activities.
Lead developer for Authentication and Authorization services with SAML, OIDC, and passwordless logins while keeping PII data secure.
Built a centralized, low-latency authorizer supporting RBAC and ABAC for OS1 platform.
Developed a scalable webhook notifications service.
Led development of messaging service enabling SMS, Email, and WhatsApp notifications using APIs and Kafka consumers.
Worked on Node.js, Scylla, Postgres, Kafka, Golang, Express.js, Java, TypeScript, Keycloak, Docker, Kubernetes.
Experience with both REST and event-driven microservices.
Owned features end-to-end from design to deployment.
Core member of FHIR Interoperability team; designed and developed FHIR-based REST APIs.
Worked as backend developer using Java Dropwizard, MSSQL.
Implemented documentation automation, security auditing, and performance metrics logging.
Worked in agile environment using JIRA and Azure DevOps.
